1.0.6.en: Added support for ELKO Smart Wirless Switch

1.0.7.en: Added error handling to prevent some device to get unavailable.

1.0.8.en: Added error handling to prevent some devices to get unavailable

1.0.9.en: Added error handling to prevent some devices to get unavailable

1.0.10.en: Redesigned Power meter and metering. It now uses the defined thermostat load in settings to calculate the metering based on relay. Power meter uses defined load to give a more preciese value in Energy tab. Fixed a error with regulator mode and flow. Fixed a error not able to set Power status on unit in flows

1.1.0.en: Fixed kWh bug, returned to old logic. Added SmartStikkDobbel & SmartStikkEnkel. Added Multiwire dimmer id's to code. Made preperations for PIR devices.

1.1.1.en: Fixed kWh bug, returned to old logic. Added SmartStikkDobbel & SmartStikkEnkel. Added Multiwire dimmer id's to code. Made preperations for PIR devices. Fixed pairing instructions

1.1.2.en: Fixed kWh bug, returned to old logic. Added SmartStikkDobbel & SmartStikkEnkel. Added Multiwire dimmer id's to code. Made preperations for PIR devices. Fixed pairing instructions

1.1.4.en: Added new devices, cleaned up some code

1.1.5.en: Added new devices, cleaned up some code

1.1.6.en: Added new devices, cleaned up some code

1.1.7.en: Added support for new ELKO Smart Multiwire dimmers, smart sockets, pir dimmer and switch. Fixed power metering bug on thermostat and max_floor_temp bug. When adding thermostats in future please go to Advanced settings to set all settings to get correct power, temperature reports, and also correct functionality regarding thermostat or regulator.

1.1.8.en: Building and fixing settings, some work under the hood making it more stabile, if you are using Super TR Thermostat as regulator, please readd as Super TR regulator device.

1.1.9.en: Updated settings handling on all devices. Rebuilt settings on Thermostat. Better handling on Thermostat <-> Regulator change. Introduced new ELKO Smart devices. Multiwire turn dimmer added as own device to add settings
